thread.title: Relieve the TCT Show + Personalize 2015 Conference Programme
thread.title_full: Relieve the TCT Show + Personalize 2015 Conference Programme

author: Daniel O'Connor
title: Relieve the TCT Show + Personalize 2015 Conference Programme
text:
Expand HP's Scott Schiller Keynote The 2015 edition of TCT Show + Personalize was a roaring success thanks in no small part to the enthusiasm the 3D technologies community poured into the event, in particular during the conference programme and seminar sessions. 
This year’s line up included illustrious keynotes from Al Siblani of EnvisionTEC , HP's J. Scott Schiller, industry consultant Todd Grimm, Mcor’s Dr Conor MacCormack and Max Lobovsky from Formlabs all of whom set the tone for a jam-packed conference agenda. 
Whether you were in attendance or not, over the coming weeks you can experience the TCT Show Conference Programme through our video series, you can expect two presentations a day to appear right here on tctmagazine.com or via our YouTube channel - make sure to hit that subscribe button order to be the first to be notified when a new video goes live. 
First up today is HP’s Wolrdwide Director of 3D Printing, J. Scott Schiller, with his presentation entitled “The Shapes of Things to Come”. The keynote includes updates on HP’s breakthrough 3D printing technology, Multi Jet Fusion. 
Later this afternoon we'll be uploading Kieron Salter of KWSP's exceptional talk on the main stage on 3D printing's influence over the motorsport industry. Tags
